name: Stanley Classic Trigger-Action Travel Mug 591ml
description: Tough enough for outside, elegant enough for the yoga studio. A push-button lid lets you sip double-doubles or herbal tea with one hand.Made of durable stainless steel.Push-button leakproof lid comes apart for easy cleaning.Keeps hot drinks hot for 9 hours, or cold drinks cold for 12 hours.Slim design fits in car cup holders.
